name: Place Game
description:
Hello!

in this game you place things by using your keyboard

for example:

H spawns a house
T spawns a tree
B spawns a bridge etc.

after you press a key, the thing spawns at your mouse pointer.
if you don't like the position of it you can drag it around

pressing the R key resets the map, and pressing the spacebar switches the background.

That's all you have to know
